document.full_text: afghanistan's acting health minister will seek international funding on tuesday for immunization, which she sees as key to reducing child mortality in a country where the average life expectancy is only 48 years.
document.title: afghan health minister seeks backing for vaccines
lines_and_colors: afghanistan's acting health minister will seek international funding on tuesday for immunization, which she sees as key to reducing child mortality in a country where the average life expectancy is only 48 years.
